name: Wavy Wafer Toro (Privada CC Exclusive)
additionalNotes:
https://privadacigarclub.com/shop/aganorsa-leaf-wavy-wafer-aged-10-months/

"Ever hear someone say, “that is not as good as it used to be?” Or, “that brand is not as good as it used to be?” What you are about to smoke is a cigar that was once famous but has since moved factories. I’ll never be able to tell you what it was, but I can tell you what it is now: the WAVY WAFER. I could have done a ghost series with this but man oh man, that name kept calling me every time I smoked it. Although chocolate syrup is the dominant flavor for me, there was always this reminder of a waffle cone or a vanilla wafer. These are the finest San Andres wrappers with the best Nicaraguan tobaccos. How could we go wrong? This cigar is a testament to the uniqueness and flavor of Aganorsa tobacco. Aged almost 1 year, the cigar is truly ripe and ready to smoke. Remember, this is a legendary blend and we are lucky to get this in our box! Shout out to Aganorsa on social media!"
